name: SCNText
desc: A geometry based on a string of text, optionally extruded to create a three-dimensional object.

items.name: init(string: Any?, extrusionDepth: CGFloat)
items.desc: Creates a text geometry from a specified string, extruded with a specified depth.

items.name: var string: Any?
items.desc: The string object whose text the geometry represents.

items.name: var font: UIFont!
items.desc: The font that SceneKit uses to create geometry from the text.

items.name: var containerFrame: CGRect
items.desc: A rectangle specifying the area in which SceneKit should lay out the text.

items.name: var isWrapped: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether SceneKit wraps long lines of text.

items.name: var alignmentMode: String
items.desc: A constant that specifies how SceneKit horizontally aligns each line of text within its container.

items.name: var truncationMode: String
items.desc: A constant that specifies how SceneKit truncates text that is too long to fit its container.

items.name: var textSize: CGSize
items.desc: The two-dimensional extent of the text after layout.

items.name: var flatness: CGFloat
items.desc: A number that determines the accuracy or smoothness of the text geometry.

items.name: var extrusionDepth: CGFloat
items.desc: The extent of the extruded text in the z-axis direction. Animatable.

items.name: var chamferRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The width or depth of each chamfered edge. Animatable.

items.name: var chamferProfile: UIBezierPath?
items.desc: A path that determines the cross-sectional contour of each chamfered edge.
